article.headline: Canisius 78, Marist 74
article.story: POUGHKEEPSIE, N.Y. (AP) -- Kevin Downey scored 18 points to lead Canisius past Marist 78-74 Friday night. Canisius (6-10) took its largest lead of the game at 67-56 with 2:25 to play, but Marist came within 69-63 with 1:09 left. The Golden Griffins went 7-10 from the free throw line in the last 69 seconds to hold off the rally. Dewitt Doss scored 14 points for Canisius, while Toby Foster had 12, Jon Ferris 11 and Yaku Moton-Spruill eight. Ferris added six rebounds. Will McClurkin led the Red Foxes (5-10) with 18 points, while Carl Hood and Chris Handy added 13 apiece. Jared Jordan had 12 points, and Brandon Ellerbee 11. Handy added seven rebounds.
